verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>take<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> for <S%H376>me.<s%> From everyone whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> makes him <S%H5068>willing<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H8641>offering.<s%>
This is the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> from <S%H2091>them:<s%> gold, <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%>
<S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair,
<S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> sea <S%H8476>cow<s%> <S%H5785>hides,<s%> <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%>
<S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
<S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>
Let them <S%H6213>make<s%> me a <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> that I may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

According to all that I <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H8403>you,<s%> the pattern of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of all of its <S%H3627>furniture,<s%> even so you shall make <S%H6213>it.<s%>

"They shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> shall be two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> its <S%H6967>height.<s%>

You shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> You shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it <S%H1004>inside<s%> and <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H5414>it,<s%> and put them in its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>feet.<s%> <S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be on the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of <S%H8147>it,<s%> and two <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the other side of <S%H8145>it.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
You shall <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>
The <S%H905>poles<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H727>ark.<s%> They shall not be taken from <S%H5493>it.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> which I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> Two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be its <S%H753>length,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the mercy <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

<S%H6213>Make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the one <S%H7098>end,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7098>end.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of one piece with the mercy <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

The <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> out their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H5526>covering<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another.<s%> The <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> shall be toward the mercy <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> on <S%H4605>top<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and in the <S%H727>ark<s%> you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> that I will give <S%H5414>you.<s%>

There I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with <S%H1696>you,<s%> and I will tell you from above the mercy <S%H3727>seat,<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> which are <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%> Two <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be its <S%H753>length,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> its <S%H6967>height.<s%>
You shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4526>rim<s%> of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6213>it.<s%> You shall make a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> on its <S%H4526>rim<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H5414>it,<s%> and put the <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that are on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
the <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be <S%H5980>close<s%> to the <S%H4526>rim,<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> that the <S%H7979>table<s%> may be carried with <S%H5375>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H7086>dishes,<s%> its <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> its <S%H7184>ladles,<s%> and its <S%H4518>bowls<s%> to pour out <S%H5258>offerings<s%> <S%H2004>with.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>set<s%> bread of the <S%H3899>presence<s%> on the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H8548>always.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> Of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> shall the lampstand be <S%H6213>made,<s%> even its <S%H7070>base,<s%> its <S%H3409>shaft,<s%> its <S%H1375>cups,<s%> its <S%H3730>buds,<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers,<s%> shall be of one piece with it.

There shall be <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of its <S%H6654>sides:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of its <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of its <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side;<s%>

<S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like almond <S%H8246>blossoms<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower;<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like almond <S%H8246>blossoms<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower,<s%> so for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H4501>lampstand;<s%>
and in the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like almond <S%H8246>blossoms,<s%> its <S%H3730>buds<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers;<s%>

and a <S%H3730>bud<s%> under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it,<s%> and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it,<s%> and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H8337>it,<s%> for the six <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>
Their <S%H3730>buds<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall be of one piece with <S%H259>it,<s%> all of it one beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H7651>seven,<s%> and they shall <S%H5927>light<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to give <S%H5927>light<s%> to the space in <S%H5676>front<s%> of <S%H6440>it.<s%>
Its <S%H4457>snuffers<s%> and its snuff <S%H4289>dishes<s%> shall be of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
It shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with all these <S%H3627>accessories.<s%>
<S%H7200>See<s%> that you <S%H6213>make<s%> them after their <S%H8403>pattern,<s%> which has been <S%H7200>shown<s%> to you on the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>
